title: 泰拉瑞亚无法启动
author: mr.ping
txt_content:
我在泰拉瑞亚吧上下载的泰拉瑞亚整合包启动不了为什么呀，我按开始游戏后虽然鼠标显示在加载 ，可是过一会就闪退了
求大大解释呀QAQ

replies.author: 空灵之心
replies.txt_content:
zy443414 发表于 2015-4-25 18:31
需要xnafx40_redist.msi    和dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe    地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1c08iFWc
我装了也启动不了，怎么都是
NO suitable graphics card found.
Coule not find a Direti3D device that suppots the XNA Framework Reach profile.
Verify that a suitable graphics device is installed.
Make sure the desktoop is not locked, and that no other application is running in full screen mode.
Avoid running under Remote Desktop or as a Windows service.
Check the display properties to make sure hareware acceleration is set to Full.{:10_527:}
